fortuneTeller:ShootingPractice.NAME: Shooting Practice
fortuneTeller:ShootingPractice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain 1 Trained. NL Create an ethereal copy.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain 1 Trained. NL Create an ethereal copy.

fortuneTeller:Reloading.NAME: Reloading
fortuneTeller:Reloading.DESCRIPTION: When your draw an ethereal card, play it.
fortuneTeller:Reloading.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When your draw an ethereal card, play it twice.

fortuneTeller:BustShoot.NAME: Bust Shoot
fortuneTeller:BustShoot.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! Damage. Then deal half damge to others

fortuneTeller:FastShoot.NAME: Fast Shoot
fortuneTeller:FastShoot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Draw !M! card of SHOOT type

fortuneTeller:NightWatchmanRecruit.NAME: Night Watchman
fortuneTeller:NightWatchmanRecruit.DESCRIPTION: When you play an ATTACK card, put a SHOOT card to your draw pile.
fortuneTeller:NightWatchmanRecruit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When you play an ATTACK card, put a SHOOT card to your draw pile.

fortuneTeller:ShowTime.NAME: Show Time
fortuneTeller:ShowTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Lose 10 hp if your damge lower then 12 this turn.

fortuneTeller:Improvisation.NAME: Improvisation
fortuneTeller:Improvisation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card, restore your energy when you played all of them this turn.

fortuneTeller:OpenPreview.NAME: Open Preview
fortuneTeller:OpenPreview.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

fortuneTeller:HolyShoot.NAME: Holy Shoot
fortuneTeller:HolyShoot.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage, gain !M! trained if kill an enemy.
